Next, we need to establish whether there was any opportunity for Harry Houdini to appear on Chris Angel Mindfreak. However, since Harry Houdini died in 1926, well before Chris Angel was born and his TV show started, it becomes clear that Houdini could not have possibly appeared on Chris Angel Mindfreak. 

Therefore, the answer to this question is (B) no, since it is not possible for Harry Houdini to appear on Chris Angel Mindfreak.
